# anthropometry-playground

An anthropometry playground in the browser.

## License

The source code in this repository is licensed under the MIT license except where otherwise noted. See `LICENSE` for details.

Portions of the source code in this repository are modifications of the work available at [web.dev](https://web.dev) and are licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. See `LICENSE-APACHE` for details.

The data in this repository is taken directly from the Anthropometric Survey of US Army Personnel (ANSUR II) available at [openlab.psu.edu](https://www.openlab.psu.edu/ansur2), which is itself a work of the United States Government and is in the public domain (17 U.S.C. ยง 105).
